title: GIAC Certified Forensic Specialist (GCFA)
description: Demonstrated expertise in advanced digital forensics, incident response, and threat hunting, with proficiency in analyzing file systems, memory, and network artifacts to detect and mitigate cyber threats

title: GIAC Certified Windows Security Administrator (GCWN)
description: Developed advanced skills in securing Microsoft Windows environments through strategic PKI management, Group Policy, and PowerShell security

title: GIAC Reverse Engineering Malware Certification (GREM)
description: Expertise in malware analysis and reverse engineering to safeguard IT infrastructure against sophisticated cyber threats

title: Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM)
description: Skilled in assessing and fortifying enterprise security postures, and adept at managing hybrid (Agile and/or Waterfall) environments including cloud, mobile, and IoT

title: CompTIA Network+
description: Adept at deploying, managing, and troubleshooting networks across various platforms, ensuring robust connectivity and cybersecurity

title: CompTIA Security+
description: Skilled in assessing and fortifying enterprise security postures, and adept at managing hybrid environments including cloud, mobile, and IoT
